website_summaries.verdict: Supportive yet comfortable skates best for use indoors.
pros: Sturdy feel thanks to aluminum frame
Comfort liner keeps feet from hurting
Secure power strap adds to stability
cons: Some say rough pavement wears brakes and wheels down quickly

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality, would be ok for light use at ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, would be ok for light use at a skating rink but wouldn't recommend for use at a park or on the street. My daughter loved the pretty colors and was happy when she opened them but they didn't last long before pieces began breaking off.
customer_reviews.author: 40 something CA country boy

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Second pair we have bought, next size up. She does amazing in these blades. She is VERY VERY picky about how shoes and socks feel....she does have Sensory Issues, so the fact that these skates don’t make her complain is HUGE! The first pair which were the size 11-2 (If I remember right) still look great after 18 months or maybe two years...of use. I purposely came back to the same blade.
customer_reviews.author: Debra RishmawiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Inline Skates!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 9yr old who wears a size 3. Plenty of room to last with the adjustable fit. My Daughter recently tried inline skates at our local roller rink and now loves them. She feels the inline skates are easier than the 4-wheel roller skates. These are nicely made and I feel they will last for her use and hopefully we can pass them on.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Very good skates!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter was super happy when we gave her these skates as a birthday present. The fit perfectly and she uses them every time she can. They are very good quality and roll quite smoothly. They are easy to put on and take off and easy to adjust the size. Very good pair of skates. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: A. GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Roll very well
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Roll very well. Design is perfect. Not like the cheapie ones you find. They don't look or roll like the usual adjustable ones. Several friends in the neighborhood have purchased them for their kids after seeing my daughters. Great purchase and they are holding up very well. Easy to adjust and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my daughter who is 6 years, she wears size 13 in regular shoes, she is enjoying them. good quality.
customer_reviews.author: OB2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, aluminum wheel frames and overall great quality. Ended up buying a second pair for my other daughter as I was so happy with the quality of the first pair. The only downside is that my girls then pestered repeatedly for their parents to join them, and lets just say that daddy looks like a hippo on rollerskates......
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for her 8th birthday. She has small feet, size 11s, so more toddler size, but she really enjoys these skates. They adjust and start at size 11, which was hard for me to find. But these work well, the ankle fits tight, the skate seem to turn easily. I haven't yet had to change the size on them, so I'm not sure how well that will go.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Peters

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter's birthday and she's only had them for a few days, but has already used them numerous times inside and outside. She loves the way they look and fit and they roll perfectly. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Just did our first adjustment to them to get to the next size. It was so easy! Daughter loves these
customer_reviews.author: I research everything

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality adjustable roller blades
customer_reviews.text: Great roller blades for kids! T My children have had a few pairs but these are the best quality. Roll well, adjustable and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: M. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these skates and only use them outdoors- holding up well!0

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to put on. Smooth riding..smooth adjustability to larger sizes

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to my niece for her bday. She loves them. They fit perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Great roller blades for my daughter. I love how they adjust too so that they'll last for a few years. She uses them outside and at the indoor rink with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It is a great skate! My 10 year old daughter loves them. She thinks they are comfortable. They roll great on the driveway. She wears a size 2 and they fit like I thought! I would recommend

customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Great fit. Perfect for our 7 year old girl. We did size up just for longer use. And they fit just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Defective skate
customer_reviews.text: After skating on this for 2 days, the shoe part completely detached from the base of the skate. We clearly received a defective skate. We are very disappointed with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with her new roller blades! These are great because they are adjustable so she will be able to use them for at least 2-3 years!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful skates for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great inline skates, especially for the price! Our 6 year-old daughter had been using a hand-me-down set of Roller Derby adjustable skates from her older sister. They lasted a long time, but it was eventually time for another pair. I'm happy we went with the same brand. Our daughter was able to put them on and start skating immediately without any difficulty. They are comfortable, easy to adjust, and have great wheels (not the cheap plastic type). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: vanbriea

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my granddaughter and she loves them! Great way for her to exercise. Seem durable, the colors are exactly like they are pictured and they are adjustable so as her foot grows she can still wear them! She is very satisfied with her skates and that’s all that matters to this Grammie!
customer_reviews.author: Blee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice roller blades
customer_reviews.text: Very nice roller blades! I bought for my 5 y.o., fit as expected. Great quality, nice looking, very comfortable)). Our child is super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of Roller Blads
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of roller blades! My daughter has had them for about 3 wks now and has used them daily since. She is very hard on things and these still are doing well. Great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy23

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Mu daughter loves them. Got these for my 6 year old who just fell in love with roller world. Well be going once a month and these worked great. Very comfortable feel, ties as well as clamps. Which is what you want in a skate trust me. These will do just fine for several years until. Pretty cool they adjust as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Yela

customer_reviews.title: More then expected
customer_reviews.text: We just got this delivered today,I was so surprised how well made they are,was not expecting much for $40.so girly,my daughter loves them.she is size 11 and they fit perfectly...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... these skates for my daughter and they fit her great and are excatly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my daughter and they fit her great and are excatly what I was looking for. I find it difficult to buy things like this online but these skates are perfect for her (she is 6 years old). I would definately recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is actually 2-5
customer_reviews.text: The quality is quite ok. However, the size was labelled misleadingly. I intended to find a rollerblade that has size 3-6 as my daughter wear size 3 shoes now. The actual size shown on the box is 2-5. Thus, my daughter probably will lose ~ 1 year of fun from the blades.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hu

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are different!
customer_reviews.text: Did anyone know why there is different between left shoe and right shoe, please see the ankle part!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

product_meta.title: Roller Derby Girls' ION 7.2 Adjustable Inline Skates White/Hot Pink/Turquoise
product_meta.description: With the simple push of a button, the Roller Derby® girls' ION 7.2 inline skates adjust up to four sizes, so you don't have to get a new pair every year. A combination of laces and straps provides a comfortable fit, and the Silver-7 bearings and urethane wheels deliver a smooth ride.
feature_bullets: Easy push button adjustable sizing, deluxe comfort liner, and power strap
Adjustable sizing: Medium fits 2-5; Small fits 11-1
